title: cpu
description: Computational processing unit of virtual and physical machines.

cpuArchitecture.description: Property. Architecture of CPU as defined per .name string of structure static const X86CPUDefinition builtin_x86_defs defined in https://gitlab.com/qemu-project/qemu/-/blob/master/target/i386/cpu.c. Non-listed architectures to be designated as 'other'Enum:'x86-32', 'x86-64', 'AArch-32', 'AArch-64', 'RISC-V', 'Other'

cpuFlag.description: Property. CPU flags as documented by lscpu and defined in https://github.com/torvalds/linux/blob/master/tools/arch/x86/include/asm/cpufeatures.h. Non-listed flags to be designated as 'other'.

smtEnabled.description: Property. Is simultaneous multithreading (SMT) or hyper threading (HT) active in this CPU? Default 'False'.

numberOfCores.description: Property. Number of cores of the CPU.

numberOfThreads.description: Property. Number of threads of the CPU.

baseFrequency.description: Property. Base frequency of the CPU.

boostFrequency.description: Property. Boost frequency of the CPU.

lastLevelCacheSize.description: Property. Last Level Cache size of the CPU.

type.description: Property. NGSI entity type. It has to be CPU
